excerpt: "Jeremy Howard, cofounder of fast.ai, a non-profit AI research group, has argued for classical liberal values on questions of AI governance, contending that restricting access to AI systems would centralize power to such an extent that it would risk “rolling back the gains made from the Age of Enlightenment.”"
